item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello and welcome to my blog! I am very excited to start my own blog, as this could be a great learning experience for myself but also provide potential help to others. I am also likely to sync my publication to my dev.to and Medium. Some content down the road would likely include: Building a project in FastAPI with clean architecture How to effectively test a FastAPI application Some learning notes about Python, Rust, C#, Golang and JavaScript/TypeScript
